title: Chat Log (Planned)
description: Placeholder schema defining the contract for historical chat logs consumed by the dashboard.

platform.description: Source platform identifier (e.g., rumble, youtube, twitch).

stream_id.description: Identifier for the stream or broadcast the chat log belongs to.

messages.description: Ordered list of chat events in chronological order.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp for when the message was observed.

author.description: Display name or identifier of the message author.

message.description: Chat message content as originally captured.

metadata.description: Optional metadata such as moderation flags, badge info, or platform-specific attributes.
